programmes.name: Diploma in Information Technology with a specialism in Software Engineering

projects.name: Oceana Clinic Management System
projects.desc: A clinic management system built to improve the business performance of a clinic. User roles include nurses, doctors and admin. Include functions like manage staffs' profiles, patients' profiles and billing

projects.name: SS Real Estate Management System
projects.desc: A web application built together with my another teammate. User roles include agent, buyer. Allow property to contact with client thorugh web app, confirm viewing dates and time with client and view personal schedule.

projects.name: Journal App
projects.desc: A simple web app used for journaling. Built along with a course named 'The Complete 2020 Web Development Bootcamp' on Udemy.

projects.name: Budget App
projects.desc: A web app that allowed user to keep track of his incomes and expenses. Sort incomes and expenses with amount of money. Built along with a course named 'The Complete JavaScript Course 2020: Build Real Projects!' on Udemy

projects.name: Heropedia
projects.desc: A wikipedia for super heroes. Built to improve my skills on Javascript after finishing several courses on MOOC. User can search for the info of a super hero and add them to favourite list.

projects.name: Instagram Clone
projects.desc: An instragram clone app built along with youtube tutorial from the channel - Clever Programmer. Include basic functionalities like adding a post and commenting on a post

projects.name: Whatsapp Clone
projects.desc: A Whatsapp clone app built along with youtube tutorial from the channel - Clever Programmer. Allowing user to create chatroom and send message in the chatroom.
